com.stripe.stripeterminal.model.external

Class DiscoveryConfiguration

  • com.stripe.stripeterminal.model.external.DiscoveryConfiguration

  • public class DiscoveryConfiguration

    The DiscoveryConfiguration contains configuration information relevant to the reader discovery process.

    Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiscoveryConfiguration

        @JvmOverloads
public DiscoveryConfiguration(int timeout,
                                            @NotNull
                                            DeviceType deviceType,
                                            boolean isSimulated)

        The DiscoveryConfiguration contains configuration information relevant to the reader discovery process.

        Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

        Parameters:
        timeout - The timeout for discovery, in seconds. If the value is 0, discovery will nottimeout. Default is 0 (no timeout).
        deviceType - The reader's device type. Default is CHIPPER_2X.
        isSimulated - Whether the devices returned by discovery should be simulated
